short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you puts Moderators on ResetERA on ignore

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Removes posts from Moderators you want to ignore
- Also works for replies
- The 'Show ignored content' on the bottom used for unhiding normal ignored users will also unhide Moderator posts
